Mariscos Jomar

Fresh Local Seafood

Mariscos Jomar

Mariscos Jomar brings the freshest catch from Costa Rica's Pacific waters directly to Uvita Mercado. Known for their commitment to quality and sustainability, they offer an impressive selection of locally-caught seafood that showcases the rich marine biodiversity of the region.

Ocean to Table

What sets Mariscos Jomar apart is their dedication to freshness. All seafood is sourced directly from local fishermen who practice sustainable fishing methods along Costa Rica's Pacific coast. Their offerings change with the seasons and available catch, ensuring you always get the best of what the ocean has to offer.

From delicate white fish like sea bass and snapper to succulent shellfish and shrimp, Mariscos Jomar provides seafood of exceptional quality. Each product is carefully handled and stored to preserve its natural flavor and texture, allowing you to experience the true taste of Costa Rica's coastal waters.

Local Expertise

The team at Mariscos Jomar brings generations of knowledge about local seafood. They're happy to offer preparation suggestions and cooking tips to help you make the most of your purchase. Whether you're planning a traditional Costa Rican ceviche or looking to grill fresh fish for dinner, they can guide you toward the perfect selection.

Their passion for local seafood extends to sustainable practices, supporting fishing methods that help maintain healthy marine ecosystems. By choosing Mariscos Jomar, you're not only treating yourself to exceptional seafood but also supporting responsible fishing in Costa Rica's waters.

Visit Mariscos Jomar

You can find Mariscos Jomar at their stand in Uvita Mercado, where they display their fresh catch daily. For the best selection, visit early in the day when their offerings are at their freshest and most abundant.
